name: Osmo - Tangram
description: Classic tangram puzzle game with physical pieces and digital feedback. Arrange geometric shapes to match on-screen puzzles. Develops spatial reasoning, problem-solving, and geometric thinking through 500+ puzzles with progressive difficulty.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Geometry, Spatial Reasoning, Problem Solving

name: Osmo - Numbers
description: Hands-on math game using physical number tiles and on-screen challenges. Build number sense, addition, subtraction, and counting through interactive gameplay. Features multiple difficulty levels adapting to ages 5-10 with over 50 games.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Arithmetic, Number Sense, Problem Solving

name: Osmo - Words
description: Spelling and vocabulary game with letter tiles. Guess words based on visual clues and place physical letters to spell answers. Builds literacy, vocabulary, and spelling skills for ages 5-12 with hundreds of word challenges.
stem_fields: Literacy, Vocabulary, Language Arts, Spelling

name: Osmo - Coding Awbie
description: Introduction to coding using physical coding blocks. Guide Awbie character through adventures by arranging command blocks. Teaches sequencing, loops, and problem-solving to ages 5-10 through 60+ coding puzzles.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Computational Thinking, Logic

name: Osmo - Coding Jam
description: Advanced coding game creating musical compositions. Use coding blocks to program beats, melodies, and harmonies. Combines programming fundamentals with music theory for ages 5-12. Develop computational thinking while making music.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Music, Audio Engineering

name: Osmo - Coding Duo
description: Cooperative coding game for two players using physical blocks. Solve coding challenges together teaching teamwork, communication, and programming logic. Ages 5-10 develop collaborative problem-solving through 60+ puzzles.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Teamwork, Communication

name: Osmo - Pizza Co.
description: Math and entrepreneurship game running virtual pizza business. Calculate change, manage toppings, and handle orders using physical coins and bills. Ages 5-12 develop money math, fractions, and business skills through gameplay.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Business, Economics, Money Math

name: Osmo - Masterpiece
description: Digital drawing and art game with physical drawing. Transform photos into line drawings and trace with real paper and markers. Develop artistic skills, visual perception, and fine motor control for ages 5-12.
stem_fields: Art, Design, Visual Arts, Fine Motor Skills

name: Osmo - Monster
description: Creative drawing game bringing drawings to life. Draw characters, objects, and scenery with physical materials while digital monster interacts. Ages 3-8 develop creativity, imagination, and artistic expression.
stem_fields: Art, Creativity, Design, Imagination

name: Osmo - Newton
description: Physics puzzle game using real-world objects. Guide falling balls to targets by placing physical items like pencils, toys, or hands. Ages 5-12 learn physics concepts, cause-and-effect, and creative problem-solving through 60+ levels.
stem_fields: Physics, Engineering, Problem Solving, Creativity

name: Osmo - Detective Agency
description: Geography and world knowledge game solving mysteries globally. Use physical magnifying glass to find clues and travel the world solving cases. Ages 5-12 develop geography, cultural awareness, and deductive reasoning through 60+ mysteries.
stem_fields: Geography, World Cultures, Critical Thinking, Research

name: Osmo - Squiggle Magic
description: Early learning game for preschoolers combining drawing and letter recognition. Draw squiggles that transform into animated characters teaching letters, shapes, and creativity. Ages 3-5 develop pre-literacy and fine motor skills.
stem_fields: Pre-Literacy, Letters, Shapes, Fine Motor Skills

name: Osmo - ABCs
description: Alphabet learning game with physical letter tiles. Match uppercase and lowercase letters, learn letter sounds, and build early literacy. Ages 3-6 develop phonics awareness and letter recognition through interactive play.
stem_fields: Pre-Literacy, Alphabet, Phonics, Letter Recognition

name: Osmo - Stories
description: Storytelling and reading comprehension game with physical costume pieces. Dress characters and create interactive stories developing literacy and creativity. Ages 4-7 build narrative skills and reading comprehension.
stem_fields: Literacy, Storytelling, Reading Comprehension, Creativity

name: Osmo - Costume Party
description: Pattern recognition and matching game with costume pieces. Dress on-screen characters by matching physical costume accessories. Ages 3-5 develop visual discrimination, matching skills, and social-emotional learning.
stem_fields: Pattern Recognition, Visual Discrimination, Matching, Social Skills

name: Osmo - Creative Starter Kit
description: Bundle including Tangram, Numbers, and Words games with Osmo Base. Complete starter package for ages 5-12 covering math, geometry, and literacy. Foundation for hands-on digital learning with three core educational games.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Geometry, Literacy, Multi-Subject

name: Osmo - Coding Starter Kit
description: Bundle with Coding Awbie, Coding Jam, and Coding Duo plus Osmo Base. Comprehensive introduction to programming for ages 5-12 using physical coding blocks. Three games teaching sequencing, loops, and computational thinking.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Computational Thinking, Logic

name: Osmo - Little Genius Starter Kit
description: Early learning bundle for ages 3-5 with ABCs, Squiggle Magic, Costume Party, and Stories. Comprehensive preschool curriculum covering letters, shapes, creativity, and social-emotional skills through hands-on play.
stem_fields: Pre-Literacy, Letters, Shapes, Creativity, Social-Emotional

name: Osmo - Genius Starter Kit
description: Complete learning bundle with five core games: Tangram, Numbers, Words, Newton, and Masterpiece plus Osmo Base. Ages 6-12 comprehensive STEM and creativity education covering math, literacy, physics, and art.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Literacy, Physics, Art, Multi-Subject

name: Osmo - Math Wizard Series
description: Advanced math game series teaching addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division through magical adventures. Physical number and operation tiles solve puzzles and defeat dragons. Ages 6-10 build computational fluency.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Arithmetic, Operations, Number Sense

name: Osmo - Parent and Teacher Dashboard
description: Free web portal tracking child progress across all Osmo games. View skills developed, time played, levels completed, and areas for growth. Generate progress reports and set learning goals. Monitor multiple children.
stem_fields: Educational Technology, Progress Tracking, Data Analytics

name: Osmo - Classroom Educator Resources
description: Free teaching resources including lesson plans, curriculum guides, and classroom management tools. Standards-aligned activities for integrating Osmo into K-6 classrooms. Professional development materials for educators.
stem_fields: Educational Resources, Curriculum, Teacher Professional Development

name: Osmo - Multi-Language Support
description: Games available in 20+ languages including Spanish, French, German, Japanese, and Chinese. Language-agnostic games like Tangram and Newton work universally. Supports English language learners and international families.
stem_fields: Language Support, Accessibility, Inclusive Design

name: Osmo - Screen Time Alternative
description: Physical hands-on learning reducing passive screen time. Children manipulate real objects while receiving digital feedback. Promotes active learning, motor skills, and healthy tech habits for ages 3-12.
stem_fields: Hands-On Learning, Active Learning, Healthy Technology Use

name: Osmo - Special Education Support
description: Games designed for children with diverse learning needs including visual, tactile, and kinesthetic learners. Physical manipulation supports fine motor development and multisensory learning. Used in special education classrooms.
stem_fields: Special Education, Accessibility, Inclusive Design, Multi-Sensory
